obsMode.Name: OBS Mode
obsMode.Hint: Sets this browser as the OBS browser. Only enable this if you are not able to use a browser source

obsModeUser.Name: OBS Mode User (Username)
obsModeUser.Hint: Sets this User to always be in OBS Mode, regardless of browser

obsModeGlobalDisable.Name: OBS View Global Disable
obsModeGlobalDisable.Hint: This will turn off the OBS features for all clients, regardless of method

minScale.Name: Minimum Scale
minScale.Hint: The lowest that the screen can zoom to

maxScale.Name: Maximum Scale
maxScale.Hint: The highest that the screen can zoom to

defaultOutOfCombat.Name: Out Of Combat Mode
defaultOutOfCombat.Hint: The out of Combat Camera Mode

popupCloseDelay.Name: Pop-Up Close Delay
popupCloseDelay.Hint: Seconds until pop-ups are automatically closed. 0 to disable

showTrackerInCombat.Name: Show Combat Tracker in Combat?
showTrackerInCombat.Hint: If checked, the Combat Tracker will be visible during Combat Turns

overlayActorSelect.Label: Open Menu
overlayActorSelect.Name: Overlay Actors
overlayActorSelect.Hint: Select the Actors for the Overlay

enableOBSWebsocket.Name: Enable OBS Websocket?
enableOBSWebsocket.Hint: If checked, OBS Websocket will be used for Remoting

rollOverlayPostRollImage.Name: Post Roll Image (Optional)
rollOverlayPostRollImage.Hint: Image to be displayed after the Roll

rollOverlayRollForegroundImage.Name: Foreground Roll Image (Optional)
rollOverlayRollForegroundImage.Hint: Image to be displayed in front of the Roll

rollOverlayRollBackgroundImage.Name: Background Roll Image (Optional)
rollOverlayRollBackgroundImage.Hint: Image to be displayed behind the Roll

rollOverlayPreRollImage.Name: Pre Roll Image (Optional)
rollOverlayPreRollImage.Hint: Image to be displayed before the Roll

rollOverlayPreRollDelay.Name: Pre Roll Delay
rollOverlayPreRollDelay.Hint: The delay in milliseconds (ms) until the pre roll is displayed

rollOverlayPreRollStay.Name: Pre Roll Duration
rollOverlayPreRollStay.Hint: The time in milliseconds (ms) that the pre roll is displayed

rollOverlayPreRollFadeIn.Name: Pre Roll Fade In Duration
rollOverlayPreRollFadeIn.Hint: The time in milliseconds (ms) that the pre roll is faded in

rollOverlayPreRollFadeOut.Name: Pre Roll Fade In Duration
rollOverlayPreRollFadeOut.Hint: The time in milliseconds (ms) that the pre roll is faded out

rollOverlayRollStay.Name: Roll Duration
rollOverlayRollStay.Hint: The time in milliseconds (ms) that the roll is displayed

rollOverlayRollFadeIn.Name: Roll Fade In Duration
rollOverlayRollFadeIn.Hint: The time in milliseconds (ms) that the roll is faded in

rollOverlayRollFadeOut.Name: Roll Fade In Duration
rollOverlayRollFadeOut.Hint: The time in milliseconds (ms) that the roll is faded out

rollOverlayPostRollStay.Name: Post Roll Duration
rollOverlayPostRollStay.Hint: The time in milliseconds (ms) that the post roll is displayed

rollOverlayPostRollFadeIn.Name: Post Roll Fade In Duration
rollOverlayPostRollFadeIn.Hint: The time in milliseconds (ms) that the post roll is faded in

rollOverlayRollPostFadeOut.Name: Post Roll Fade In Duration
rollOverlayRollPostFadeOut.Hint: The time in milliseconds (ms) that the post roll is faded out

showAV.Name: Show Video Overlay?
showAV.Hint: If enabled, the Audio/Video Chat UI will be visible on OBS (might require reload in OBS)

showUserConfig.Name: Allow User-Config to Render?
showUserConfig.Hint: If enabled, the user config dialog will not be suppressed

fixedPopups.Name: Use Fixed Pop-Ups
fixedPopups.Hint: If enabled, all Popups are repositioned and resized to the configured values

fixedPopupX.Name: Pop-Up X
fixedPopupX.Hint: The distance to the left screen edge in pixels

fixedPopupY.Name: Pop-Up Y
fixedPopupY.Hint: The distance to the top screen edge in pixels

fixedPopupWidth.Name: Pop-Up Width
fixedPopupWidth.Hint: The width of the pop-up in pixels

fixedPopupHeight.Name: Pop-Up Height
fixedPopupHeight.Hint: The height of the pop-up in pixels
